titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on artichokes, prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend and decrease the temporary reduction of duty on artichokes, prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid.
